All Officers
Toi
From: Harry Skomie
Dates February 23, 1954
At Graydon1 s excellent suggestion, just a note on ny
recent trips, etc* Just back from Atlantic City where I
took part as panel participant on Joint MSA- SEA Session,
m which Araard Hunter. ??nd Harry Eewbu -n were sneakers t
BLAZING NEW TRAILS IN EDUCATIONAL TELECASTING,
Good talks. Lively discussion. But rather small crowd.
High praise for fine job done by Hunter for JCET Exhibit-
demonstration there.
Interviewed two engineer candidates (Bailey and
Bonvouloir) also, to sake the Ij* day trip worthwhile „
Off to Chicago for DAVI recordings committee meeting®
and conference March 2-5, with meeting (with Graydon) with
Harry Newborn scheduled for March 5«
Then off to East Lansing to represent (at their expense)
NAEB at AAAGE Joint Project sessions at East Lansing March 15
16, stopping at Kellogg, Battle Cr ak, to pay my belated
respects, either on the way to or from East Lansing,
Thereafter, upcoming* B5RT and possible west coast trip
if services requested there at TV conferences as per Graydon*
earlier note.
Hill will now be covering at Headquarters when I*a away.
HJSido
